Monday, June 5, 2006

Register for Rails Day

Posted by marcel

Registration for Rails Day 2006 is now open.

Over the last few days they’ve announced a lot more prizes, including five licenses to TextMate, a few iPods, a boat load of books from the Pragmatic Programmers and even a Mac Mini.

Head on over and signup your team.
